item.title: Top trends in fintech and financial services in 2023
item.description: In India, the financial services and fintech sectors witnessed a significant growth during the pandemic. As the situation is normalising for many sectors, growth in the financial services and fintech industry has seen an upward trajectory which shows that the trend is not just a passing phase.

content:encoded.p: In India, the financial services and fintech sectors witnessed a significant growth during the pandemic. item.title: Salman Khan had to hug MC Stan to make him believe he really won Bigg Boss 16: 'I couldn't understand if sir was joking'
